name: FlightStats
description: FlighStats provides a wide variety of information related to aviation and air travel, including scheduling and flight delays, aircraft current position and route tracking, on-time and service ratings, weather affecting aviation, and airport information.  Real-time alerts provide flight departure and arrival information with delay indexes.  Route schedules and best connections data also are available, along with ratings of historic on-time performance, airport weather, and more.
